title: Virtual Assistant – Customer Service & Guerrilla Social Media Marketing
job_overview:
Time Zone: U.S. Central Time (flexibility required for some overlap)
Compensation: Based on experience, paid hourly or monthly
Language: Fluent English required (spoken and written)
Overview:
We are a growing U.S.-based company seeking a proactive and resourceful Virtual Assistant (VA) from the Philippines with strong communication skills and a creative flair for social media. This role combines inbound customer service, sales support, and organic social media marketing with a focus on Facebook Marketplace and buy/sell/trade groups for local lead generation.

Key Responsibilities:
Customer Support & Sales Assistance
 • Answer inbound phone calls and professionally assist customers
 • Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or social media messaging
 • Build quotes and proposals using our proprietary pricing models
 • Review customer-submitted images to assist in quote accuracy
 • Log and track customer information and interactions
Social Media & Guerrilla Marketing
 • Post regularly in Facebook Marketplace, local buy/sell/trade groups, and community pages
 • Manage organic content posting and engagement across platforms (primarily Facebook)
 • Schedule, monitor, and engage with posts, comments, and messages
 • Implement guerrilla marketing tactics to boost local visibility without using paid ads
 • Work with the team to develop new ideas and messaging strategies
 • Track post performance and adapt tactics based on what works
?
Qualifications:
 • Prior experience in customer service, virtual assistant roles, or social media marketing
 • Strong understanding of Facebook’s platform, especially Marketplace and groups
 • Excellent written and spoken English
 • Confident speaking on the phone with U.S. customers
 • Basic sales or quoting experience preferred
 • Comfortable using images and online tools to build quotes
 • Creative thinker with a “hustle” mentality for non-traditional marketing
 • Self-motivated, reliable, and able to work with minimal supervision
